Component.Name: StudioAPIServer
Component.Description: Provides StudioAPI server for non CDP application integration.

Alarm.Name: ValueQueue Overload Warning
Alarm.Description: StudioAPIServer ValueQueue almost full. To ensure the CDP application does not skip periodic value updates to client, disconnect some clients from the CDP application or reduce the count of periodically changing values that are plotted/displayed in client

Alarm.Name: ValueQueue Overload Error
Alarm.Description: StudioAPIServer ValueQueue overflow. The server may skip sending periodic value updates to client. To restore reliable data sending, disconnect some clients from the CDP application or reduce the count of periodically changing values that are plotted/displayed in client
